title: Webpage Change Tracker Dataset
description: Structure of the data saved when monitoring webpage changes.

report.title: Visual Analysis Report
report.description: Premium visual dashboard showing text and image diffs.

results.title: Dataset Results
results.description: Full dataset containing individual change records.

url.title: Monitored URL
url.description: The URL of the webpage that was checked.

checkedAt.title: Checked At
checkedAt.description: The timestamp when the check was performed.

changed.title: Changed
changed.description: Whether any change was detected (textual or visual).

status.title: Status
status.description: The result of the check (INITIAL_RUN, CHANGED, or NO_CHANGE).

visualChangePercent.title: Visual Change %
visualChangePercent.description: Percentage of pixels that changed visually.

aiSummary.title: AI Summary
aiSummary.description: AI-generated explanation of the changes detected.

changes.title: Detailed Changes
changes.description: List of text/HTML additions and deletions.
